actions.in_committee: House Committee on District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Fiscal Affairs and Health.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Fiscal Affairs and Health

official_title: A bill to convey the District of Columbia Employment Security Building to the District of Columbia.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Labor to convey to the District of Columbia without monetary consideration all right, title, and interest of the United States in and to the District of Columbia Employment Security Building and the land on which it stands.

titles.title: A bill to convey the District of Columbia Employment Security Building to the District of Columbia.
